description:
11.33 colorcorrect
Adjust color white balance selectively for blacks and whites.
This filter operates in YUV colorspace.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: colorcorrect

parameters.description: Set the red shadow spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: rl

parameters.description: Set the blue shadow spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: bl

parameters.description: Set the red highlight spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: rh

parameters.description: Set the blue highlight spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: bh

parameters.description: Set the amount of saturation. Allowed range is from -3.0 to 3.0. Default value is 1.
parameters.name: saturation

parameters.description:
If set to anything other than manual it will analyze every frame and use derived parameters for filtering output frame.

Possible values are:

‘manual’
‘average’
‘minmax’
‘median’

Default value is manual.
parameters.name: analyze

source:
11.33 colorcorrect

Adjust color white balance selectively for blacks and whites. This filter operates in YUV colorspace.

The filter accepts the following options:

rl

Set the red shadow spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.

bl

Set the blue shadow spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.

rh

Set the red highlight spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.

bh

Set the blue highlight spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.

saturation

Set the amount of saturation. Allowed range is from -3.0 to 3.0. Default value is 1.

analyze

If set to anything other than manual it will analyze every frame and use derived parameters for filtering output frame.

Possible values are:

‘manual’
‘average’
‘minmax’
‘median’

Default value is manual.
